channel.title: Lightning on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Lightning on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Regarding the overnight storm of October 24 2011
item.description:
ANN ARBOR, October 24, 2011, 5:00 a.m. - I wasn't expecting to be woken up by lightning, but there you are. The map is from StrikeStar, and a zoomed in power outage showing the north shore of Base Line Lake.
500a woken up by thunder and lightning 522a localized power outage
